title: Ti' Punch Recipe
full_text:
Ti' Punch Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
white rhum agricole
2 to 4
teaspoons
cane syrup
, to taste
1
slice
lime
, cut from the side of the fruit
Directions
In a rocks or old-fashioned glass, pour the cane syrup and squeeze the lime slice, which has been cut from the side of the fruit so that the aromatic oils from the peel will flavor the drink. Add the rum and stir until syrup is dissolved; add a few large cubes of ice and briefly stir to chill.
Rum
